Row.Text: Use up to all of your iron for spare-parts and alloys to boost or finish this production.[NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE]Use {1_Amount_Iron} [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] to boost for {2_Amount_Production} [ICON_PRODUCTION]
You already have boosted a production on this turn.
No production to boost right now.

Use up to all of your niter for its chemical components to boost or finish the current research.[NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE]Use {1_Amount_Niter} [ICON_RESOURCE_NITER] to boost for {2_Amount_Science} [ICON_SCIENCE]
You already have boosted the research on this turn.
No research to boost right now, consider selecting one.

Use up to all of your horses for horse-farms and gourmet-restaurants to boost or finish the current cultural development.[NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE]Use {1_Amount_Horses} [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] to boost for {2_Amount_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE]
You already have boosted you cultural development on this turn.
No cultural development to boost right now, consider selecting one.
